name: Sugar & Cup: Brain Game
description:
Sugar and cup: brain game is a wonderful drawing game which in turn is a brain training exercise for you. In Sugar and cup draw lines with the help of finger as likecrayon to direct sugar cubes falldown into cup.

Sugar flow free is limited in numbers so draw lines in such a way that all the cups gets filled with same color sugar dots. Draw something of some shape to make flow free of sugar in the cup.

In this game there are various levels with complex targets and every single falling down sugar counts. You can change the color of flow free sugar with the help ofportals. Draw lines in such a manner that you can guide falling down sugars to pass through the portal and finally flow free in the desired cup.
In Sugar and cup brain game sometimes it seems that it is impossible to pass the falling sugar through all the portals and finally into the cup. Now here comes thereal brain training for you as manage all the sugars.

How to play:
Draw lines to guide falling down sugar dots.
Use portals to change color of falldown cubes with the help of crayon.

Game Features
• Brain game for all ages
• Manage impossible sugar dots to flow free in cups.
• A wonderful puzzle for your brain training.
• A great combination of brain , dots and drawing skills.
